long_description: The Dalbello Yetti 2 ski boots offer your little shredder the comfort and performance of adult boots in a small size. Supercomfort liner system brings soft, warm, extremely comfortable support to small feet. 2 microadjustable buckles let young skiers dial in the fit for comfort and performance. Ratchet adjusts the tightness around the upper ankle. The Dalbello Yetti 2 ski boots offer a flex index appropriate for lightweight skiers.
short_description: The Dalbello Yetti 2 ski boots offer your little shredder the comfort and performance of adult boots in a small size.
